cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.DL, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of natural language processing techniques for recommendation systems in the scientific literature, which suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the use of machine learning techniques for learning representations, which falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and deep learning (cs.DL). Finally, the paper discusses the use of a tool for scientific watch, which could be related to social and information networks (cs.SI).
